    • StandardMessage

      public StandardMessage(String idSender, String receiver, String text)
      Construct an instance with given sender id, receiver and text, timestamp is set on localtime at instance creation
      Parameters:
      idSender - the id of the sender
      receiver - the receiver of the message
      text - an String representation of message text content

      public String getReceiver()
      This method returns the id of the receiver of the message

      If receiver.isEmpty()==true then the message is supposed to be sent broadcast
